html: I am excited to see what else is ahead for #WV and for all Americans thanks to #taxreform and look forward to continuing to deliver pro-growth solutions that will help improve lives across the country.
text: I am excited to see what else is ahead for #WV and for all Americans thanks to #taxreform and look forward to continuing to deliver pro-growth solutions that will help improve lives across the country.

html: 6 months later & #taxreform continues making real & meaningful change: 4 million workers have received bonuses Consumer confidence is at an 18-yr. high 102 utility companies have cut rates 8,000+ low-income communities have been designated as #OpportunityZones
text:
6 months later & #taxreform continues making real & meaningful change:

4 million workers have received bonuses

Consumer confidence is at an 18-yr. high

102 utility companies have cut rates

8,000+ low-income communities have been designated as #OpportunityZones

html: #Taxreform isn’t just benefiting #WV small businesses and working families. These benefits are also helping to improve entire communities.
text: #Taxreform isn’t just benefiting #WV small businesses and working families. These benefits are also helping to improve entire communities.

html: I’ve heard from WVians like Chris from Charleston who wrote to me saying that thanks to the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, small businesses have hired more people, raised employee wages, and expanded operations.

html: The Kanawha County Library Clendenin Branch was destroyed two years ago in the flooding that swept through our state. Yesterday, they finally were able to reopen their doors at a new location. So happy to see our communities rebuilding!pic.twitter.com/HLKzLmxYQG
text: The Kanawha County Library Clendenin Branch was destroyed two years ago in the flooding that swept through our state. Yesterday, they finally were able to reopen their doors at a new location. So happy to see our communities rebuilding!pic.twitter.com/HLKzLmxYQG

html: Thinking today of all the loss & destruction our state experienced two years ago but also remembering the incredible generosity & compassion we saw in the flooding's wake. It's that WV spirit & determination that I know will to move us forward as we continue working to recover.
text: Thinking today of all the loss & destruction our state experienced two years ago but also remembering the incredible generosity & compassion we saw in the flooding's wake. It's that WV spirit & determination that I know will to move us forward as we continue working to recover.

html: Happy #MothersDay! My mother was a very warm and gracious woman who always made me feel good about myself. One of the pieces of advice she always told me was ‘Shelley, be true to yourself,’ and that’s a trait I’ve tried to carry on in my mother’s honor.pic.twitter.com/w8w0iRdvnB

html: Elizabeth Cady Stanton. Lucretia Mott. Susan B. Anthony. These strong women were true pioneers in the fight for women’s rights, & they continue to inspire me today. html: The partial filling of #opioid prescriptions is one way we can reduce the drug supply & prevent unused prescriptions from ending up in the wrong hands. I introduced the Reducing Opioids Risk Act yesterday with @SenWarren to do just that. DETAILS:https://bit.ly/2IOLfM3

html: Just voted to pass the #omnibus, a bill I helped author as an Appropriations Committee leader. It provides funding for efforts to combat the #OpioidEpidemic, rebuild our #infrastructure strengthen national security, & grow the economy. Read more:https://bit.ly/2GgjzRP
